item.description:
Join us for tapas, sangria and fun times at Tasca Restaurant in Brighton. Voted best of Boston in 2005 by Boston Magazine and the Improper Bostonian, Tasca offers reasonably priced tapas in an inviting atmosphere with live guitar music.

Everyone pays for their own food/drink. Join us for a fun time with good food and lots of friendly and interesting people! If you have trouble finding us, call 774 232 0000.

Tasca offers valet parking as well.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo). I will be carrying a large red purse.
item.name: Tapas, Sangria and Fun Time at Tasca, Brighton
